MemberSignature.Value: public static IntPtr GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr (Guid clsid, Guid riid);
.method public static hidebysig native int GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr(valuetype System.Guid clsid, valuetype System.Guid riid) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr (clsid As Guid, riid As Guid) As IntPtr
public: static IntPtr GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr(Guid clsid, Guid riid);

Docs.summary: 傳回指定類別上的指定介面。
Docs.returns: 要求之介面的 Unmanaged 指標。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法很類似，表示這個執行階段的介面上呼叫方法。
下表顯示支援的組合`clsid`和`riid`。
|`clsid`|`riid`| |-------------|------------| |CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenser|IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx| |CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserRuntime|IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx| |CLSID_CorRuntimeHost|IID_CorRuntimeHost| |CLSID_CLRRuntimeHost|IID_CLRRuntimeHost (不適用於所提供的 common language runtime [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)])，IID_CLRRuntimeHost3| |CLSID_TypeNameFactory|IID_TypeNameFactory| |CLSID_CLRStrongName|IID_CLRStrongName|
<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr%2A> 類似於<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject%2A>方法。

Docs.permission: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

public: static System::Object ^ GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject(Guid clsid, Guid riid);
